title: The Belligerent Miss Boynton
description: PRIDE'S CHALLENGEWhen Amanda Boynton made her entrance at the opening of Almack's, the ladies gasped and the gentlemen gaped.And towering over the startled assembly, Jared Delaney stood transfixed. Accustomed to the giddy young ladies who twittered and swooned at the sight of him, the dashing lord was captivated from his first glimpse of the high-spirited beauty who mocked him with bold and dancing eyes.Challenged by her defiance, enchanted by her dazzling smile, London's most eligible bachelor vowed he would tame this Miss Boynton! But the lady had a mind of her own, and when Jared Delaney took her to live at Storm Haven, his ancestral manor, he found that the independence he had seen in her eyes was just a hint of Miss Boynton's spirit.
author: Kasey Michaels
